intent_atoms.description: The BoxNode aggregate must be a sendable struct that captures headers, optional catalog metadata, parsed payload details, validation issues, and child nodes.
ParseTree now stores an array of BoxNode instead of ParseTreeNode; a public typealias preserves existing ParseTreeNode references to maintain backward compatibility.
The shared BoxNode aggregate is used by UI, CLI, and export layers, ensuring consistent tree representation across components.

functional_units.name: BoxNode Aggregate
functional_units.description: Defines the canonical BoxNode domain type used across ISOInspectorKit for representing parsed data nodes with headers, optional catalog metadata, payload details, validation issues, and child nodes.

functional_units.name: ParseTree Structure
functional_units.description: Stores an array of BoxNode instances and provides a public typealias to preserve existing ParseTreeNode references.

functional_units.name: Tree Builder Responsibilities
functional_units.description: Defines responsibilities for building the shared tree model used by UI, CLI, and export layers.
